title: Retry production deployment for Version 33 (Dini GC favicon + title)

requirements.text: Retry the production deployment for the latest successful build (Version 33), ensuring the already-updated branding assets are what ship to production (HTML document title is "Dini GC" and the referenced favicon/apple-touch-icon assets load correctly from the production site).

quotes: If you want, I can retry the production deploy for you.

acceptanceCriteria: A production deployment succeeds without a generic "Deployment error".
On the production site, the browser tab title is "Dini GC".
On the production site, the favicon appears and is loaded from the path referenced in frontend/index.html (/assets/generated/dinigc-favicon.dim_64x64.png).
On the production site, the apple touch icon is referenced as /assets/generated/dinigc-apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png.

constraints: Do not introduce new product features or UI changes; this request is a deployment retry only.
nonGoals: Implementing or configuring a custom domain (e.g., dinigc.com).
Any new changes to favicon design beyond what is already in the current build.
